import React, { Component } from "react"; import "reactjs-popup/dist/index.css"; import Modal from "react-modal"; import "./AddVoucherModal.css"; import logo from "../img/logo.png" const customStyles = { content: { top: "50%", left: "50%", right: "auto", bottom: "auto", marginRight: "-50%", transform: "translate(-50%, -50%)", }, }; export default class AddVoucherModal extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { subtitle: undefined }; } afterOpenModal() { // references are now sync'd and can be accessed. var a = this.state.subtitle; a.style.color = "#f00"; a.style.width = "500px"; a.style.height = "500px"; this.setState({ subtitle: a }); } closeModal() { this.props.closeModal(); } render() { return (
